quote_last: , later than Theo had expected. The road, narrow and deserted, opened palely before them, then slid under the wheels like a strip of torn and soiled linen.
title: The Children of Men
author: P.D. James

quote_first: “It’s the way the world will end, Harry. Recorded cocktail music nuclear-powered to play on for centuries after all life has been destroyed. Selections from ‘No, No, Nanette,’ throughout eternity. That do you for
title: The Night People
author: Jack Finney

quote_last: . Two-handed, Cec lifted his peak cap from the chair.
title: Downriver
